sentences: Oled sa veel küsinud oma vanematelt?
Ta oli küsinud, kas tuleme homme.
context: The word 'küsinud' is the past tense (perfect) form of the verb 'küsima', which means 'to ask'. It indicates that someone has performed the action of asking at some point in the past. In Estonian, this is formed by adding the '-d' suffix to the stem 'küsi-'.
